translation: Zero's arrived! Stop her now!{#Name="Soldier A"}

source: For Lady One!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: For Lady One!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: For Lady One!{#Name="Soldier A"}

source: Who granted us salvation when all seemed lost!?{#Name="Soldier B"}

source: Lady One!{#Name="Soldier G"}

source: I'm going in! Cover me!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Got it!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Got it!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: We can't let them past here!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: We can't let them past here!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Our combined might will be Lady One's salvation!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Our combined might will be Lady One's salvation!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: What's that foul demon planning to do with our Lady One!?{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: What's that foul demon planning to do with our Lady One!?{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: I hesitate to even think it! We must put a stop to her!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: I hesitate to even think it! We must put a stop to her!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Lady One will bring salvation to the world!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Lady One will bring salvation to the world!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: All will bow the knee before Lady One's majesty!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: All will bow the knee before Lady One's majesty!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Please protect Lady One for us!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Please protect Lady One for us!{#Name="Soldier G"}

source: Prayer alone won't cut it. Stand up and fight for your savior!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Forward! Forwaaaaaard!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Forward! Forwaaaaaard!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Lady One needs our help!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Lady One needs our help!{#Name="Soldier A"}

source: We have Lady One's blessing on our side!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: You're right! We can't lose now!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: You're right! We can't lose now!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Protect us! Guide us!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Protect us! Guide us!{#Name="Soldier B"}

source: The winds of victory are blowing!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: So this is One's home base, is it?{#Name="Zero"}
source: So this is One's home base, is it?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm fine! Go get that guy! {#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm fine! Go get that guy! {#Name="Zero"}

translation: Right! Be careful, Zero! Be careful, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Right! Be careful, Zero! Be careful, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Stop repeating yourself!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Stop repeating yourself!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: My name is Zero, the original Intoner, and the immortal—{#Name="Zero"}
source: My name is Zero, the original Intoner, and the immortal—{#Name="Zero"}

translation: KNOCK IT OFF! I'm trying to make a speech here!{#Name="Zero"}
source: KNOCK IT OFF! I'm trying to make a speech here!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Now... Uh...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Now... Uh...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh for fuck's sake! Now I lost my place!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Oh for fuck's sake! Now I lost my place!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Think you're ready for me!?{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Think you're ready for me!?{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Ha! That's so cute.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Ha! That's so cute.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The only way through here is over our dead bodies!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: The only way through here is over our dead bodies!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Oh ho! Is that really the kind of thing you{LF}want to say to an Intoner and her disciple?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho! Is that really the kind of thing you{LF}want to say to an Intoner and her disciple?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Hold her off as long as you can!{LF}Lady One's counting on us!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Hold her off as long as you can!{LF}Lady One's counting on us!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: She'll be counting your bodies soon!{#Name="Zero"}
source: She'll be counting your bodies soon!{#Name="Zero"}

source: ワン様には指一本触れさせない！{#Name="兵士G"}

translation: She'll be counting your bodies soon!{#Name="Zero"}
source: She'll be counting your bodies soon!{#Name="Zero"}

source: Nnngh...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Are you okay, Zero? Are you okay!?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Are you okay, Zero? Are you okay!?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Stop repeating things, dammit!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Stop repeating things, dammit!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But your flower...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: But your flower...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Look. You just worry about killing One.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Look. You just worry about killing One.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: She's a powerful foe.{#Name="Zero"}
source: She's a powerful foe.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: She keeps her magic sealed inside{LF}her by pure will alone—{#Name="Zero"}
source: She keeps her magic sealed inside{LF}her by pure will alone—{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That's how she's managed to stay sane.{#Name="Zero"}
source: That's how she's managed to stay sane.{#Name="Zero"}

source: And you won't be able to beat her{LF}if you keep getting distracted!{#Name="Zero"}

source: But—{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: No buts!{#Name="Zero"}
source: No buts!{#Name="Zero"}

source: アイツ……ワンは最強なんだ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ゼロより強いの！？{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ゼロより強いの！？{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: まさか！　私よりは弱い。弱いハズ。だから、大丈夫だ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: まさか！　私よりは弱い。弱いハズ。だから、大丈夫だ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: One!{#Name="Zero"}
source: One!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You think you're the only one who can fix things?{#Name="One"}
source: You think you're the only one who can fix things?{#Name="One"}

translation: The world doesn't need Intoners!{#Name="One"}
source: The world doesn't need Intoners!{#Name="One"}

translation: Heh. I completely agree.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Heh. I completely agree.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Then die already!{#Name="One"}
source: Then die already!{#Name="One"}

translation: You first, Sis!{#Name="Zero"}
source: You first, Sis!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I can eradicate the Intoners as easily as you can!{#Name="One"}
source: I can eradicate the Intoners as easily as you can!{#Name="One"}

translation: Like I can trust you? I have to do this myself!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Like I can trust you? I have to do this myself!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You should talk! You gave birth to this curse!{#Name="One"}
source: You should talk! You gave birth to this curse!{#Name="One"}

translation: Whether we have the same goal or not,{#Name="One"}
source: Whether we have the same goal or not,{#Name="One"}

translation: I swear by my murdered sisters' souls...{#Name="One"}
source: I swear by my murdered sisters' souls...{#Name="One"}

translation: I will never forgive you! Now DIE!{#Name="One"}
source: I will never forgive you! Now DIE!{#Name="One"}

translation: Die, die, die, DIIIIIIE!{#Name="One"}
source: Die, die, die, DIIIIIIE!{#Name="One"}

translation: Heh. I never asked for forgiveness.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Heh. I never asked for forgiveness.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So quit all your fucking yapping...{#Name="Zero"}
source: So quit all your fucking yapping...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: and die for me already, One!{#Name="Zero"}
source: and die for me already, One!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Recording: M5310_E0040_GM{#Name="Accord"}
source: Recording: M5310_E0040_GM{#Name="Accord"}

translation: The flower's defenses created{LF}five sisters from Zero's body.{#Name="Accord"}
source: The flower's defenses created{LF}five sisters from Zero's body.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: At first, they were simply corpses{LF}controlled by the flower.{#Name="Accord"}
source: At first, they were simply corpses{LF}controlled by the flower.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: But soon, they gained self-awareness{LF}and began to act of their own free will.{#Name="Accord"}
source: But soon, they gained self-awareness{LF}and began to act of their own free will.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: If the flower isn't destroyed, mankind{LF}has no future in this branch.{#Name="Accord"}
source: If the flower isn't destroyed, mankind{LF}has no future in this branch.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Some of us are of the opinion that this{LF}branch should be sealed off at once,{#Name="Accord"}
source: Some of us are of the opinion that this{LF}branch should be sealed off at once,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: but I disagree.{#Name="Accord"}
source: but I disagree.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: I think at least one of them{LF}might be able to accomplish it...{#Name="Accord"}
source: I think at least one of them{LF}might be able to accomplish it...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: ...No. I should stop. {#Name="Accord"}
source: ...No. I should stop. {#Name="Accord"}

translation: I'll erase this entry and hand the recording{LF}off to the next pass in its current state.{#Name="Accord"}
source: I'll erase this entry and hand the recording{LF}off to the next pass in its current state.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: End Recording.{#Name="Accord"}
source: End Recording.{#Name="Accord"}
